name: Squire
description: The Squire is a hardworking class with a very noble personality. Being just a few steps away from becoming a knight, the squire trains day in and day out to one day accomplish his dream.

name: Knight
description: Having unwavering loyalty to his homeland and Discipline that knows no bounds, the knight is a very tough and reliable class.

name: Tank
description: With a body as big as a mountain and a physique tougher than the hardest metals, the tank is an absolute unit that can defend even the strongest of blows.

name: Rogue
description: As sneaky as a shadow with skillful hands that could steal the eye of a cyclops without it noticing, the rogue is agile with sticky hands.
